Package com.digitalglobe.platform2020.identity.configuration

This package contains Spring configuration classes to add OAuth2 information to the environment

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EndpointSecurityConfigurer
    Implement this interface to add more security configurations to your paths.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthorizationConfiguration  
    EndpointSecurityConfiguration  
    EndpointSecurityConfiguration.AuthorizationAndAccessConfigurer  
    EndpointSecurityConfiguration.SsoIgnoredConfiguration  
    SecurityBeanConfiguration
    Create Spring beans necessary for OAuth2 SSO integration within a CloudFoundry environment

Package com.digitalglobe.platform2020.identity.configuration Description

This package contains Spring configuration classes to add OAuth2 information to the environment
